title: Waffle House Sign Font
content:
I'm looking for a match to the Waffle House sign font. My best attempt was Houshka Alt Pro, but the W in Waffle House is narrower and the S wider. Just wanted to know if there was an exact match out there.

Thanks!

Font: 

 Abadi MT Extra Bold 

Solved By: 

 [bojev](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417041524/http:/typophile.com/user/7409 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [waffle-house.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417041524/http:/typophile.com/files/waffle-house.jpg) | 36.94 KB |
author: Neaner1425

comments.content: Try Abadi MT extra Bold as it is closer - and with a bit of careful tweeking will be spot on
